components.copy: Literal is an award-winning app that makes reading entire books fun, engaging, and addictive - even for the most reluctant readers. In addition to Literal's addictive reading format, the app empowers teachers, parents and readers by providing real-time analytics to track reading progress, activity, and average reading speed.

company.description: Social reading for the Tik Tok generation.
company.title: Social reading for the Tik Tok generation.
